_raw_molfraction_acid.description: mol weighted fraction of acid out of acid+solvent

_raw_molfraction_solvent.description: mol weighted fraction of solvent out of acid+solvent

_calc_weightedhansen_deltad.description: weighted hansen deltad parameter calculated from mol weighted acid and solvent (e.g. [experiment's solvent deltad = acid(deltad)+ solvent(deltad)]

_calc_weightedhansen_deltah.description: weighted hansen deltah parameter calculated from mol weighted acid and solvent (e.g. [experiment's solvent deltah = acid(deltah)+ solvent(deltah)]

_calc_weightedhansen_deltap.description: weighted hansen deltap parameter calculated from mol weighted acid and solvent (e.g. [experiment's solvent deltap = acid(deltap)+ solvent(deltap)]
